data.title: Top 35 Russian News Websites in 2024
data.meta_description: Russian news Website Best List. Get latest news from russian news, russian news online, russian newspapers, moscow news, russian english news, russia world news by following top Russian news sites.
data.meta_site_name: FeedSpot for Journalists, Editors and Reporters
data.text:
1. The Moscow Times

The Moscow Times is Russia's leading independent English-language news outlet, offering balanced and comprehensive reporting on the country's latest developments. With a dedicated team of Russian and English journalists, it provides global readers with breaking news, in-depth stories, and insightful analysis about Russia. Established in 1992, The Moscow Times has a long history of delivering high-quality journalism despite challenging environments. The publication covers a wide array of topics including politics, business, culture, and more, making it a crucial source of information for those seeking to understand Russia's complexities.

Media Outlet themoscowtimes.com

Facebook Followers 764.8KTwitter Followers 217.5KInstagram Followers 22K Frequency 15 posts / day Get Media Outlets ContactsGet access to 25k active journalists, reporters, editors and media contacts in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of media outlet contacts you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active media list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. TASS Russian News Agency

TASS, established in 1904 as the St. Petersburg Telegraph Agency, is Russia's premier news agency and one of the most cited in the country. TASS provides comprehensive news coverage with nearly 3,000 daily news items in six languages and has over 1,700 employees globally. Notably, TASS is unique in having a correspondent at the International Space Station. The agency also manages a vast media bank and hosts numerous high-profile events.

Media Outlet tass.com

Facebook Followers 70.6KTwitter Followers 111.5KInstagram Followers 304.2K Frequency 30 posts / day

3. The Russian Government

The news section of the official Russian government website provides updates and information on governmental activities, policies, and international relations. It covers topics such as economic developments, trade agreements, and intergovernmental meetings. The site aims to inform the public about the decisions and actions of the Russian government and its leaders, offering detailed reports and official statements.

Media Outlet government.ru

Frequency 4 posts / week

4. RT

RT is the first Russian 24/7 English-language news channel which brings the Russian view on global news. RT creates news with an edge for viewers who Question More. RT covers stories overlooked by the mainstream media, provides alternative perspectives on current affairs, and acquaints international audiences with a Russian viewpoint on major global events.

Media Outlet rt.com

Facebook Followers 6.3MTwitter Followers 3.1MInstagram Followers 1M Frequency 30 posts / day

5. RIA Novosti

Get News in Russia and the world, the most up-to-date information: topics of the day, reviews, analysis. Photo and video from the scene, infographics, radio, podcasts. Follow us to keep abreast of key regional, federal and international news.

Media Outlet ria.ru

Facebook Followers 1.8MTwitter Followers 444.5KInstagram Followers 1.1M Frequency 30 posts / day

6. Reuters » Russia

Find the latest breaking world news from Russia in this section of Reuters.com, your online source for international news coverage. Reuters brings you top news, photography, and videos from around the world.

Media Outlet reuters.com

Facebook Followers 6.8MTwitter Followers 25.7MInstagram Followers 5M TypeNews AgencyFormatDigitalLanguageEnglishFoundedOctober 1, 1851Founder(s)Paul Julius ReuterOwner(s)Thomson ReutersHeadquarters30 South Colonnade, Canary Wharf, London E14 5EPNews Tipstips@reuters.comAdvertisement Inquirieshttps://www.reutersprofessional.com/advertising-solutions/Phone1-347-509-6837Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/ReutersXhttps://twitter.com/reutersInstagramhttps://www.facebook.com/FoxBusinessShow More

7. Sputnik » Russia

All the latest news and stories from Russia. Stay tuned for updates and breaking news on Russian politics, economy and cultural events. Only relevant insights into Russia and its relations with other countries around the globe. Sputnik is a major new media brand with multimedia centers in dozens of countries.

Media Outlet sputniknews.com

Facebook Followers 1.3MTwitter Followers 360.3KInstagram Followers 138.3K Frequency 10 posts / week

8. Meduza

Every day Meduza brings you the most important news and feature stories from hundreds of sources in Russia and across the former Soviet Union. Their team includes some of Russia's top professionals in news and reporting.

Media Outlet meduza.io

Facebook Followers 362.8KTwitter Followers 1.6MInstagram Followers 1M Frequency 30 posts / day

9. Pravda.ru

Pravda On-Line was launched in January of 1999, the first Russian newspaper of its kind. The newspaper Pravda analyzes events from the point of view of the Party's interests, whereas Pravda On-line takes a pro-Russian approach to forming its policy.

Media Outlet pravda.ru

Facebook Followers 76.7KTwitter Followers 23.3K Frequency 30 posts / day

10. FiNE News

FiNE NEWS is the perfect solution for those who want to receive high-quality news without unnecessary garbage. We select only what is really worth your attention.

Media Outlet fine-news.ru

Frequency 30 posts / day

11. Lenta.ru

Get News, articles, photos, videos from Russia on science and technology, sports, culture, economy among other things. Seven days a week, 24 hours a day.Lenta.ru is a Russian news publication. We have been working around the clock without breaks and days off since 1999.

Media Outlet lenta.ru

Facebook Followers 762.8KTwitter Followers 1.1MInstagram Followers 81K Frequency 30 posts / day

12. Komsomolskaya Pravda

Read Continuous updated news on International, Russia, Politics, Society, Economy, Health, etc. Komsomolskaya Pravda is the most popular newspaper in the country. The newspaper's website leads the ranking of the most visited electronic media with a daily audience of more than one and a half million people.

Media Outlet kp.ru

Facebook Followers 945.7KTwitter Followers 319.4KInstagram Followers 252.2K Frequency 10 posts / week

13. AiF Adygea

Find Arguments and facts in Adygea: news and events of Maikop and the Republic of Adygea. Today's picture, experts' forecasts. The Arguments and Facts weekly is one of the most authoritative and successful publications in Russia, a leader among socio-political weeklies.

Media Outlet adigea.aif.ru

14. Vesti

The latest news from Russia and the world, politics, economics, business, exchange rates, culture, technology, sports, interviews, special reports, incidents and much more. The site 'Vesti.Ru' is the main information resource of the All-Russian State Television and Radio Broadcasting Company on the Internet.

Media Outlet vesti.ru

Facebook Followers 1.7MTwitter Followers 3MInstagram Followers 1M

15. M24.RU

Moscow news, reports and interviews about the main events of the city. Fresh information about events in the capital. Poster of events and live broadcasts from the places of events on Moscow 24.

Media Outlet m24.ru

Facebook Followers 309.5KTwitter Followers 658.6KInstagram Followers 388.9K

16. Nizhny Novgorod News

Read daily updated latest news and headlines related with economy, society, sports, technology, international news and more. The newspaper and website provide daily news from Nizhny Novgorod region.

Media Outlet nnews.nnov.ru

17. Evening Moscow

The most up-to-date information about what happened in Moscow, the Russian Federation and the world today. Analytics. Reports, photos and videos from the scene. Vechernyaya Moskva is a city newspaper of influence, widely and promptly covering the main events in the capital, the work of city services, the activities of government bodies, as well as top events in the country and the world.

Media Outlet vm.ru

Facebook Followers 39.6KTwitter Followers 9.6KInstagram Followers 10.2K Frequency 30 posts / day

18. Nezavisimoye Voyennoye Obozreniye

Latest Russian news and world news. Politics. Economy. Wars. Culture. All the latest news in Nezavisimaya Gazeta. Nezavisimaya Gazeta is one of the largest periodicals in modern Russia, dedicated to topical issues of social, political and cultural life in Russia and abroad.

Media Outlet nvo.ng.ru

19. Nezavisimaya Gazeta

Latest Russian news and world news. Politics. Economy. Wars. Culture. All the latest news in Nezavisimaya Gazeta. Nezavisimaya Gazeta is one of the largest periodicals in modern Russia, dedicated to topical issues of social, political and cultural life in Russia and abroad.

20. Utro.ru

Latest news for today. The latest news of Russia and the world, news of politics, show business. Incidents today - photo and video.

Facebook Followers 861Twitter Followers 9.6K Frequency 9 posts / week

21. Novye Izvestia

The website of Novye Izvestia contains the latest news, analysis of major events, impartial journalistic investigations, intriguing photo reports and videos. 'Novye Izvestia' is a daily socio-political newspaper.

Media Outlet newizv.ru

Facebook Followers 11KTwitter Followers 3.6KInstagram Followers 23.4K

22. Chita.Ru

Get news on culture, lifestyle, society, economy and other news. Providing residents of the Trans-Baikal Territory with complete and truthful information about the life of the region.

Media Outlet chita.ru

Facebook Followers 3.1KTwitter Followers 3.6KInstagram Followers 154.7K

23. Amic.ru

News in Barnaul and Altai Krai: live reports with photos and videos. Interesting topics, experts, answers to questions, tests, games. Information agency 'Amitel' is the most popular and widely read mass media in the Altai Territory. Every day, the publication with a 25-year history informs thousands of residents of the region and other regions about the most important events, explains the essence and meaning of what is happening in the country and abroad.

Media Outlet amic.ru

Instagram Followers 36.2K

24. province.ru

province.ru covers 26 regions of Russia and publishes news from different parts of Russia and the world. Our journalists follow the regional news especially closely. This is a network of weekly newspapers for the whole family, covering about a third of Russian regions. We publish weekly newspapers with a total circulation of about 550,000 copies in 26 regions of Russia.

Media Outlet province.ru

Frequency 30 posts / quarter

25. Economics and Life

Get the latest news of economics, accounting, taxes and law. Economy and Life is a one-stop business publication for doing business. Published since 1918.

Media Outlet eg-online.ru

Facebook Followers 2.2KTwitter Followers 1.4K Frequency 4 posts / day

26. Trud newspaper

Trud Newspaper will tell you about the latest news, incidents, politics, work and entertainment in Russia. Read the newspaper about work and life. It is interesting to read us and it is pleasant to communicate with us within the framework of a given topic.

Media Outlet trud.ru

Facebook Followers 2K

27. Metro

Read daily updated latest news and headlines related with economy, politics, sports, international news and more. Metro newsis a global news company providing news in various countries including Canada, Spain, USA, etc.

28. Pravda Severa

Pravda Severa brings you the Latest News from Russia. Get live news and the latest stories from Politics, Business, society, Sports and more.

29. Sobesednik.ru

articles about the life of celebrities, interviews with directors and actors, topical texts about social problems. Independent socio-political publication. Journalistic investigations, publications by Dmitry Bykov. Find

30. Tverlife.ru
